alert.note: Alert for Maverick (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 17 at 12:25AM CDT until March 17 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL MAVERICK COUNTY... At 1225 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Eagle Pass, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Eagle Pass, Chula Vista, Radar Base, Rosita, Siesta Acres, Eidson Road, Fabrica, Elm Creek, Las Quintas Fronterizas and Seco Mines. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
